summary: Fix ProxySQL query rules reconciliation job entrypoint and command policy compliance

changes.description: ProxySQL query rules reconciliation job now overrides the container entrypoint to `sh` so the reconcile script runs directly instead of triggering the ProxySQL service entrypoint (which requires the `db_password` secret and would exit immediately).

ProxySQL reconcile script is now base64-encoded before being passed as a command argument, eliminating newline characters from argv and resolving command policy `argv contains unsafe characters` violations.
